QUESTION:In Cangjie code language,What are the basic collection types in Cangjie and their characteristics?
ANSWER:Cangjie provides several basic collection types, each suitable for different use cases:
Array: Suitable when elements need to be modified but not added or removed.
ArrayList: Suitable for frequent addition, deletion, and modification of elements.
HashSet: Ensures that each element is unique.
HashMap: Stores a series of key-value mappings.
The following table summarizes the basic characteristics of these types:
| Type Name      | Element Mutability | Add/Delete Elements | Element Uniqueness | Ordered Sequence |
| -------------- | ------------------ | ------------------- | ------------------ | ---------------- |
| Array<T>       | Y                  | N                   | N                  | Y                |
| ArrayList<T>   | Y                  | Y                   | N                  | Y                |
| HashSet<T>     | N                  | Y                   | Y                  | N                |
| HashMap\<K, V> | K: N, V: Y         | Y                   | K: Y, V: N         | N                |
